channel.title: pop on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in pop on Rusland 1

item.title: The 25-Year Career of Zemfira
item.description: We start with music, for a change from old to new. 25 Years Zemfira Talgatovna Ramazanova (1976, in Tatar: Земфира Тәлгать кызы Рамазанова) made her debut in the last century (1999), under not overly creative creative but perhaps strategic title Zemfira.

item.title: Wolves in the Shooting Range (Волки в тире)
item.description: War Title track from the album ( YouTube , Bandcamp , Spotify ) released in 2023. Featuring девять песен о войне , nine songs about war, с ее похоронами в финале, with its funeral in the finale (Meduza 2023).

item.title: Manizha 3x
item.description: Strong There’s not much to the message if you just listen to the chorus. Every Russian woman should know she is strong, but that’s in English ( lyrics ). Still, it was enough to cause controversy: see for example Russia’s Eurovision entry to be investigated for ‘illegal’ lyrics (The Guardian, 18-03-2021) and Conservative Russia in retreat as Tajik refugee raps her way to Eurovision (The Telegraph, 13-03-2021).

item.title: 25/17 3x
item.description: 25/17 is/was Ant (Ant) or Anton Zavyalov (1982) and Bledny (Pale) or Andrey Pozdnukhov (1976). Подорожник (Plantain) (2014) From the album Русский подорожник (Russian plantain ). Featuring Dmitry Revyakin (= Dmitry Revyakin ), from Kalinov Most (= Kalinov Most ).

item.title: DenDerty (Денис Бурашников) 3x
item.description: Тотальное Самоубийство (Total Suicide, 2015) A monologue fragment from the post-nuclear science fiction film Письма мёртвого человека (Dead Man’s Letters, 1986). See Wikipedia English or Russian , watch on Ivi.tv or Culture.ru (also on YouTube after logging in).

item.title: ЛЮТИК – 7 whisky-colas and Tired of Drinking
item.description: 7 виски кол Whisky-cola, for example. It starts with two and quickly moves to five. It doesn’t stop there, nor at the seven mentioned in the title. I’m having so much fun (мне так весело) – I hope I forget everything (надеюсь всё забуду) as soon as I get home (как только я зайду в свой дом).

item.title: Anacondaz 4x
item.description: Всё хорошо (2019) From Мои дети не будут скучать (2019). Всё хорошо. Повеситься или повесить ружьё? Да ну, что за мысли. Ведь всё хорошо! (всё хорошо!) Перезимовали за гаражом, радуюсь так, будто не заражён Ныряли ведь в пруд голышом – значит Бог защитит Значит всё хорошо

item.title: Дайте танк 3x
item.description: With the added bonus of strong lyrics. See Тексты Дайте танк (!) – лучшие в русской музыке (СЕИН, 2020, 24 m) and «Ещё одна новая волна»: читаем тексты группы Дайте Танк (!) (Yandex Zen, 2019). From Kolomna (or Коломна ), active since 2007.

item.title: Monetochka (Elizaveta Gyrdymova)
item.description: Balloon Her voice was also mentioned on Вечерний Ургант (December 2018), where host Ivan Urgant says у вас очень красивый голос , you have a very beautiful voice. Monetochka then inhales helium from a balloon to lower the pitch. Even she is surprised by the result.

item.title: Ras Orchestra – No Way Back (Нет пути назад)
item.description: So what. If the weather gods aren’t cooperating, the true rasta man or woman will make it sunny themselves. Jah (in Russian Джа) is great. Njet puti nazad The opening track is by Ras Orchestra (not to be confused with Rasta Orchestra ).

item.title: Dora & Tanny Volkova – Doradoera
item.description: Superdoera In Дорадура (Doradoera), Dora talks about herself. Because Dora goes through things, and things go wrong. With dates and such. Flights of fancy from the heart. All because (всё потому, что) Dora is a fool (Дора – дура): Dora is a fool.

item.title: Дельфин 3x
item.description: Весна (2008) Text Дельфин on the clip below and (his memories of) the 1980 Olympics on Together with Дельфин, we remember the clip “Весна” (Sports.ru, 2020). Надя (2014) Text 520 (2018) Text Bonus: Без Нас (Without Us, 2008); more music on Spotify .

item.title: TапОК – Every Day is Winter
item.description: And then, the холодильник (fridge) and the кошелёк (wallet) are also пустой (empty). From Гроза Танцполов , released in 2017. Text More about TапОК or TapOK on Facebook and VK . Recent (2020) is the album Кончало.

item.title: Murakami 3x
item.description: Here are three songs from the period 2013-2018. Бред (2013) Вдох на прощание Пообещай мне всё изменить Так бесполезно Это не честно, падая в бездну Любить Text Невозможно (2015) И бесполезно тащить вниз, иди с собою на компромисс; И ждать последний удар в висок – невозможно так!

item.title: Grechka – Picture
item.description: Prikrasnaja kartina A картина can be anything – an image, a photo, or a painting. “Picture” should cover it all, but Grechka still can’t reach it. In the opening verse, it’s already mentioned that между нами дождь, и расстояние: between us, there is rain and distance.

item.title: Komsomolsk 3x
item.description: Азбука плохого вкуса (ABC of bad taste, 2017) The lyrics appear on screen. Азбука Вкуса (ABC of Taste) is a supermarket . Всё исчезло (Everything disappeared, 2018) I clicked somewhere (я нажала что-то) and everything disappeared (исчезло всё).

item.title: Animal ДжаZ – Three Stripes
item.description: Jeans and Sneakers Джинсы порезаны: jeans cut. Лето: summer. Три полоски на кедах: three stripes on sneakers. Под теплым дождем: in the warm rain. There is also a lyrics version, a performance with Amatory, and one with Alai Oli .

item.title: Би-2 – Hipster
item.description: London vibes Узкие джинсы, майка с принтом = skinny jeans and a shirt with a print. This rhymes with В целом не важно что будет потом: generally, it doesn’t matter what comes after. Лечь на дно (lit.: lie on the bottom) with your London music (вместе с музыкой Лондона), all gone by (всё прошло) and out of style (всё такое не модное).

item.title: Свидание – Me and your cat
item.description: Two clips Two versions of the clip for Я и твой кот (2016). One Original, the other Official, so both are included. For more confusion, check out the video for Забудь в парке – with the same footage as in the Original below.
